title: Put that in your pipe, Luigi Garlaschelli, and smoke it
post: I don’t really like the term ‘skeptic’ because it implies that such a person is anti-mystery or anti-faith, it also implies that if a person doesn’t self-identify as a ‘skeptic’ they are anti-science and anti-reason. I prefer the word ‘seeker’ because an honest seeker of truth is what we’re all called to be.
author: David Goulet
